item.description:
Hey All,

Wine night - Cheshire CT address to be provided a couple days
before to the Yes' only responses.

Bring a pot luck dish or cheese and crackers with multi
varieties.

Let's have 2 people go in on a bottle of $30 or more. or if your coming by yourself or don't want to go in with someone just bring a bottle for $15 please to ensure we have decent wine.

Get some different types of wine so we have a varied taste
testing..
Reds Malbec, Blends, cab, merlot, shiraz pinot noir, whites -
sav blanc, chards, reisling,
pinot grigio ..

Just post it so we know who wants to partner and who want to buy one alone so we know.

I am limiting it to a certain number of people, so please come if you RSVP YES...

Also, this is cross posted with a group out of Windsor so there should be different groups of people.

Please ensure you show up if you RSVP yes, since we may have a waiting list and you are taking up a persons spot if you do not show up.

Thanks All,

Ralph

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Wine night at the Ambassador's House.
